SDA.SDA module

class SDA.SDA.SDA(model, data_loader, settings, hydro_model=None)[source]

Bases: object

Smart Democratization Advisor creates sigopt parameter or model parameter based on different model type

model

model type, can be provided models such as dlrm, dien, wnd or udm(user defined model)

Type

str

data_loader

A dataset iterator or infomation container

Type

HydroDataLoader

settings

passed-in configuration includes global configuration, sigopt config and model parameters

Type

dict

hydro_model

history best model object, if this attribute is not None, we can resume from a history experiment.

Type

HydroModel

launch()[source]

Launch a new SDA task

This method will generate a SDA instance to generate model parameters based on model type and user input, then iterating train and sigopt communication to find the best model

Returns

  • model_path (str) – best trained model saved path

  • metrics (list) – A list of this best trained model infomation
